manage.title: Manage Your Booking
manage.subtitle: Here you can view and manage your free coaching booking.
manage.rescheduleSuccess: Your coaching has been successfully rescheduled. A confirmation email has been sent with the updated details.
manage.cancelSuccess: Your coaching has been cancelled successfully. We're sorry to see you go, but you're always welcome to book again.
manage.selectDate: Select a date to see available times
manage.cancelWarning: Are you sure you want to cancel your booking? This action cannot be undone.
